name: 1-Pixel
description:
Hi  There ! the reason i make this game is i joined the "1 Pixel Challenge" From Vincoo Developer

Credit For Him :

YT : Vincoo Developer

Enjoy The Game!

Control :

A, D / Left And Right Arrow : Move

Space                                                 : Jump

How To Play : Just Play It!!!!!!!!!!! *nah im joking

Avoid the red thing its your enemy, you can kill them by jump on her head, and watch out for the orange glowing thing, its a lava.... and the yellow thing... its a bullet, and! dont fall... and Enjoy!
